message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's meet in the middle.
Let's split it evenly this time. I'm willing to compromise and hope we can reach an agreement.
You're trying to meet in the middle, but I'm not giving up on getting a better deal. You're closer to the top end of the range.
I understand you want a better deal, but I'm also trying to get a fair share.  Let's compromise.  I'll accept a 45/55 split in your favor. This way, we can both walk away with something.
